overview: Finally the new film by the hardest actress most loved by Italians, Alessandra Schiavo. More beautiful than ever and divinely directed by Romeo Visconti, Alessandra will try her hand at a formidable undertaking, managing to carry out a millionaire scam on the WallStreet Stock Exchange. Passion, hate, corruption, and much more in a truly unique film also for its erotic content.
title: Donna d'onore
